snippet: Brazil’s foreign minister said his government would press the United Nations to take action that “preserves the sovereignty of all countries.”
abstract: Antonio Patriota, Brazil's foreign minister, expresses concern over revelations about American spying and says that his government will press the United Nations to take action.
lead_paragraph: Brazil’s foreign minister said his government would press the United Nations to take action that “preserves the sovereignty of all countries.”

headline.main: Brazil Voices ‘Deep Concern’ Over Gathering of Data by U.S.
headline.print_headline: Brazil Voices ‘Deep Concern’ Over Gathering of Data by U.S.
